thread.section_title: Preferred Patron Customer Loyalty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Preferred Patron Customer Loyalty | preferredpatron.com
thread.title: Shawn
thread.title_full: Preferred Patron Customer Loyalty reviewed by Shawn

author: Shawn
title: Shawn
text:
We have been with Preferred Patron for many years. The system is great, easy to use, always reliable, and the Preferred Patron staff is very engaged with us when needed. I always Joke with my contact Brett that no matter when I call him he always answers the the phone and has time for me. It's like he waiting on me to call. (Not that I have to call a lot) :)
Great Product, Great People!
